conbody.p: Elements can contain other elements. Nested elements are children of their parent container.
For example, the download link in the script below is an element nested in another.
conbody.codeblock: • Download
conbody.p: It is difficult to identify a nested element, such as the <a> element in the script above. To define the XPath manually, we need to have solid knowledge about the DOM structure of the webpage.
